sn41.8:1.1: Tena kho pana samayena nigantho nataputto macchikasandam anuppatto hoti mahatiya niganthaparisaya saddhim.
sn41.8:1.2: Assosi kho citto gahapati: “nigantho kira nataputto macchikasandam anuppatto mahatiya niganthaparisaya saddhin”ti.
sn41.8:1.3: Atha kho citto gahapati sambahulehi upasakehi saddhim yena nigantho nataputto tenupasankami; upasankamitva niganthena nataputtena saddhim sammodi.
sn41.8:1.4: Sammodaniyam katham saraniyam vitisaretva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho cittam gahapatim nigantho nataputto etadavoca:
sn41.8:1.6: atthi avitakko avicaro samadhi, atthi vitakkavicaranam nirodho”ti?
sn41.8:2.1: “Na khvaham ettha, bhante, bhagavato saddhaya gacchami.
sn41.8:2.2: Atthi avitakko avicaro samadhi, atthi vitakkavicaranam nirodho”ti.
sn41.8:2.3: Evam vutte, nigantho nataputto ulloketva etadavoca:
sn41.8:2.4: “idam bhavanto passantu, yava ujuko cayam citto gahapati, yava asatho cayam citto gahapati, yava amayavi cayam citto gahapati, vatam va so jalena badhetabbam manneyya, yo vitakkavicare nirodhetabbam manneyya, sakamutthina va so gangaya sotam avaretabbam manneyya, yo vitakkavicare nirodhetabbam manneyya”ti.
sn41.8:3.2: katamam nu kho panitataram—nanam va saddha va”ti?
sn41.8:3.4: “Aham kho, bhante, yavadeva akankhami, vivicceva kamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkam savicaram vivekajam pitisukham pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn41.8:3.5: Aham kho, bhante, yavadeva akankhami, vitakkavicaranam vupasama …pe… dutiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn41.8:3.6: Aham kho, bhante, yavadeva akankhami, pitiya ca viraga …pe… tatiyam jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn41.8:3.7: Aham kho, bhante, yavadeva akankhami, sukhassa ca pahana …pe… catuttham jhanam upasampajja viharami.
sn41.8:3.8: Na so khvaham, bhante, evam jananto evam passanto kassa annassa samanassa va brahmanassa va saddhaya gamissami?
sn41.8:3.9: Atthi avitakko avicaro samadhi, atthi vitakkavicaranam nirodho”ti.
sn41.8:4.1: Evam vutte, nigantho nataputto sakam parisam apaloketva etadavoca:
sn41.8:4.2: “idam bhavanto passantu, yava anujuko cayam citto gahapati, yava satho cayam citto gahapati, yava mayavi cayam citto gahapati”ti.
sn41.8:5.2: ‘evam ajanama idam bhavanto passantu, yava ujuko cayam citto gahapati, yava asatho cayam citto gahapati, yava amayavi cayam citto gahapati’ti.
sn41.8:5.3: Idaneva ca pana mayam, bhante, bhasitam:
sn41.8:5.4: ‘evam ajanama idam bhavanto passantu, yava anujuko cayam citto gahapati, yava satho cayam citto gahapati, yava mayavi cayam citto gahapati’ti.
sn41.8:5.5: Sace te, bhante, purimam saccam, pacchimam te miccha.
sn41.8:5.6: Sace pana te, bhante, purimam miccha, pacchimam te saccam.
sn41.8:5.7: Ime kho pana, bhante, dasa sahadhammika panha agacchanti.
sn41.8:5.8: Yada nesam attham ajaneyyasi, atha mam patihareyyasi saddhim niganthaparisaya.
sn41.8:5.9: Eko panho, eko uddeso, ekam veyyakaranam.
sn41.8:5.10: Dve panha, dve uddesa, dve veyyakaranani.
sn41.8:5.11: Tayo panha, tayo uddesa, tini veyyakaranani.
sn41.8:5.12: Cattaro panha, cattaro uddesa, cattari veyyakaranani.
sn41.8:5.13: Panca panha, panca uddesa, panca veyyakaranani.
sn41.8:5.14: Cha panha, cha uddesa, cha veyyakaranani.
sn41.8:5.15: Satta panha, satta uddesa, satta veyyakaranani.
sn41.8:5.16: Attha panha, attha uddesa, attha veyyakaranani.
sn41.8:5.17: Nava panha, nava uddesa, nava veyyakaranani.
sn41.8:5.18: Dasa panha, dasa uddesa, dasa veyyakaranani”ti.
sn41.8:5.19: Atha kho citto gahapati nigantham nataputtam ime dasa sahadhammike panhe apucchitva utthayasana pakkamiti.
